name: Gromequian
short_description:
Gromequian is a game where aliens called Gromequians wage war with Earth, and just when it looks like doom, an alien rises up against it's people and helps Earth. You play as Bowloo, the rebel alien. Other main charecters include Jerry, Mark, Kari, and the king of Gromek, Loyan.

Players will face several different enemy types like the Flyer, Phsyco, and humans gone crazy from the war.

Gromequian is an action/adventure mixed  with a shooter.

The story is basically trying to save the earth from Loyan's army, and defeating Loyan himself.

The multiplayer is an all out war between players. The modes are Team Battle and Free for All. In Team Battle, players are either humans or Gromequians and, depending on which team, players can use different weapons. In Free for All, players are still either Gromequians or humans, but have access to both races' weaponry.
summary: When aliens called Gromequians wage war on Earth, one alien helps eart
